title: The Werewolf Principle
description: Andrew Blake, found frozen in a space capsule after 200 years on a wandering asteroid, is brought back to a strangely different Earth. In his search for identity he suddenly becomes frighteningly aware of two alien beings that lurk within his body. With this discovery as a clue to his origin, Blake gradually unearths the mystery-shrouded "Werewolf Principle"--a scientific theory buried in the past that promises startling consequences for the future.
author: Clifford D. Simak
